title: Energy security after gas: Why Europe needs a fresh mindset
summary_full: The electricity grid is fast becoming the backbone of Europe’s economy, climate strategy and security architecture. Without major, sustained investment in the grid, renewables cannot scale, electrification will stall and vulnerabilities will grow
